text: Hey folks, is there any way to recover some of the Slack history for a channel? There were some good comments that I saw a week ago, but they have disappeared before I could copy them down. Is there an archive or something anywhere?

elements.text: Hey folks, is there any way to recover some of the Slack history for a channel? There were some good comments that I saw a week ago, but they have disappeared before I could copy them down. Is there an archive or something anywhere?

text: Can we cross post this publicly to <https://discourse.julialang.org|Discourse> for further visibility? React with :bridge: on the message above to approve. <https://github.com/JuliaCommunity/SlackBridge/blob/main/README.md#faq|More info here>
no, but you can bookmark messages

elements.text: no, but you can bookmark messages

text: Success, it has been cross posted <https://discourse.julialang.org/t/54934| to Discourse>. Keep and eye out on Discourse for responses and please add an answer there once you are satisfied with the solution so others can benefit as well. Happy debugging!
I’m pretty sure anyone can export slacks public channel history, thought you may need to be an admin

elements.text: I’m pretty sure anyone can export slacks public channel history, thought you may need to be an admin

text: <@UDB26738Q>. Oh okay. Does bookmarking make the post pinned for like everyone on the channel, or does it just bookmark the post for me personally.

elements.text: . Oh okay. Does bookmarking make the post pinned for like everyone on the channel, or does it just bookmark the post for me personally.

text: <@UGR3910CQ> Oh interesting. There were some posts on the <#CN04R7WKE|sciml> channel like 1.5 weeks ago that I meant to write down but forgot. And now they are gone. So should I just ask on that channel if someone can pull the history, or is there a separate admin channel to ask on?

elements.text: Oh interesting. There were some posts on the

channel like 1.5 weeks ago that I meant to write down but forgot. And now they are gone. So should I just ask on that channel if someone can pull the history, or is there a separate admin channel to ask on?

text: I don't know if the message will eventually disappear, but it definitely stays longer than the rest of the history, I have a couple of saved items from 2019

elements.text: I don't know if the message will eventually disappear, but it definitely stays longer than the rest of the history, I have a couple of saved items from 2019

text: I would try and see if you can export the history

elements.text: I would try and see if you can export the history

text: I will keep that in mind. <@UDB26738Q>. <@UGR3910CQ> I was trying to see where I can export the history? Is there an option somewhere.

elements.text: I will keep that in mind.
I was trying to see where I can export the history? Is there an option somewhere.

text: Hey <@UDDSTBX19>, if you were able to find an answer here on Slack, please cross post it to Discourse via the link above. Thank you!
